00054 #define QEP_SIGNAL_SIZE 1
00055 
00056 // Exact-width types. WG14/N843 C99 Standard, Section 7.18.1.1
00057 typedef signed   char  int8_t;          
00058 typedef signed   short int16_t;         
00059 typedef signed   long  int32_t;         
00060 typedef unsigned char  uint8_t;       
00061 typedef unsigned short uint16_t;      
00062 typedef unsigned long  uint32_t;
